sentence: (RTTNews) - Salesforce.com Inc (CRM) revealed a profit for its second quarter that rose from the same period last year.
The company's earnings came in at $2.63 billion, or $2.85 per share.
This compares with $0.09 billion, or $0.11 per share, in last year's second quarter.
Excluding items, Salesforce.com Inc reported adjusted earnings of $1.33 billion or $1.44 per share for the period.
Analysts had expected the company to earn $0.67 per share, according to figures compiled by Thomson Reuters.
Analysts' estimates typically exclude special items.
The company's revenue for the quarter rose 28.8% to $5.15 billion from $4.00 billion last year.
-Analysts Estimate: $0.67 -Revenue (Q2): $5.15 Bln vs. $4.00 Bln last year.
